history: IRC is back to normal as far as I know. Please join #0x00sec at irc.0x00sec.org/6697
Never fear nugget is here, due to the amount of requests will be looking at making shows weekly, that would be 3 on topic, 1 random AF

There were some kiddies messing about (spamming, relentless reconnects) so it seems only useful to make it by invite only, I think it’s better. You’ll also need a voice to use #0x00sec as well I believe. Join us in #public on the irc, you’ll see all the familiar faces, come on in
